overview:
Thiago is a Manager in the Corporate Strategy group at Hewlett-Packard, where he works in projects that involves C-Level executives and the Board of Directors.

Prior to HP, Thiago worked for over six years at Accenture Brazil. He was part of the Strategy Service Line and was involved in different functional areas including M&A, Strategic Planning, Financial Analysis, and Sales, and in different industries – Telecom, Financial services, Mining, Energy, and Consumer Goods. He also worked at Bunge, one of the largest Agribusiness conglomerates in the world. In addition, Thiago led a team of six MBA students in a short term consulting assignment for DuPont in Western Europe.

Thiago graduated with a bachelor degree in Computer Science from Universidade Estadual de Campinas, Brazil and a MBA from the Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth.
